name: 3D Animations
description: During my university years, I discovered 3D animation and Computer Graphics through a school association, and it quickly became my passion. I spend my free time creating small animations, not only to have fun, but also to better understand the desires of artists. As an engineer, I think this hobby will allow me to create tools that will be useful for them.

elements.name: Gate of Babylon
elements.description:
Hair simulation of Lightning from Final Fantasy XIII-2 performing Gate of Babylon .
  • Software: Blender (Cycles)
  • Date: 03/2023
  • Time spent: 1 day approx.

elements.name: Merry X-mas
elements.description:
Short animation for Christmas, featuring a customized Xion from Kingdom Hearts.
  • Software: Blender (Cycles)
  • Date: 12/2022
  • Time spent: 2 days approx.

elements.name: Auto Memory Doll
elements.description:
An introduction scene of Violet Evergarden, the main character of the eponym light novel that got an animated adaptation by Kyoto Animation.
Violet's model by Okuto.
  • Software: Blender (Cycles)
  • Date: 05/2022
  • Time spent: 1 week approx.

elements.name: Wotakoi but it is Genshin
elements.description:
A short animation inspired by the opening of ヲタクに恋は難しい (Wotaku ni koi wa muzukashii). The characters are from the video game Genshin Impact.
  • Software: Blender (Eevee) and After Effects
  • Date: 12/2022
  • Time spent: 4 days approx.

elements.name: Fireworks
elements.description:
An attempt to create a Disney-like animation using The Voice France's interpretation of Katy Perry's song, Fireworks. Characters are Rain (Blender Studio) and Iris (@pancake_manicure)
  • Software: Blender (Cycles)
  • Date: 09/2022
  • Time spent: 3 weeks approx.

elements.name: Zeal of Proud
elements.description:
Fan-made animation of Roselia singing Zeal of Proud on stage. First attempt to apply physics on bones for hair and cloth simulations. Characters are from BanG Dream! (Bushiroad)
  • Software: Blender (Cycles) and Premiere Pro
  • Date: 07/2022
  • Time spent: 3 weeks approx.

elements.name: Shadow the Hedgehog
elements.description:
Featuring my favorite hedgehog (sorry Sonic), I tested Mixamo's characters and animation on the soldiers.
  • Software: Blender (Cycles)
  • Date: 05/2022
  • Time spent: 1 week approx.

elements.name: Raiden
elements.description:
An attempt to reproduce Raiden's entrance from Genshin Impact
  • Software: Blender (Eevee)
  • Date: 07/2022
  • Time spent: 1 week approx.

elements.name: Azula's firestyle
elements.description:
A short choregraphy of Azula from Avatar: The Last Airbender practicing her firebending.
  • Software: Blender (Eevee)
  • Date: 06/2022
  • Time spent: 1 week approx.

elements.name: SeeYa
elements.description:
Inspired by Non Non Biyori and featuring Anya from Spy x Family
  • Software: Blender (Eevee)
  • Date: 04/2022
  • Time spent: 1 day

elements.name: Virtualisation
elements.description:
The beginning of an unfinished Code Lyoko project. Characters are from the PS2 game Code Lyoko : Plongez vers l'Infini .
  • Software: Blender (Eevee + Cycles)
  • Date: 02/2022
  • Time spent: 1 week approx.

elements.name: No
elements.description:
Rain saying 'No'. This was made to see how far my internship in a motion capture studio changed my vision of facial animation.
  • Software: Blender (Cycles)
  • Date: 08/2022
  • Time spent: 1 hour

elements.name: Sports sections
elements.description:
An animation that presents all the sports available at my university. For two years, it was shown when new students arrived.
  • Software: Blender (Eevee)
  • Date: 08/2021
  • Time spent: 2 weeks approx.

elements.name: Untitled
elements.description:
My first little movie.
  • Software: Blender (Cycles)
  • Date: 12/2021
  • Time spent: 4 weeks approx.

elements.name: Daily life
elements.description:
Inspired by Horimiya, this is a short clip describing the everyday life of a member of a video production association.
  • Software: Blender (Cycles)
  • Date: 05/2021
  • Time spent: 2 weeks approx.

elements.name: M6 add remake
elements.description:
An attempt to reproduce the commercial spot of the channel M6.
  • Software: Blender (Eevee)
  • Date: 05/2021
  • Time spent: 1 hour approx.

elements.name: Disney remake
elements.description:
A parody of Disney's intro and Rise Of the Guardians.
  • Software: Blender (Cycles) and After Effects
  • Date: 04/2022
  • Time spent: 3 weeks approx.
